bibdata.title: IEEE Standard Requirements for Switching-Impulse Voltage Insulation Strength for AC High Voltage Circuit Breakers Rated on a Symmetrical Current Basis (362 kB and Above)
IEEE Standard Requirements for Switching-Impulse Voltage Insulation Strength for AC High Voltage Circuit Breakers Rated on a Symmetrical Current Basis (362 kB and Above)

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This standard covers requirements for switching-impulse voltage insulation strength for outdoor AC high-voltage circuit breakers having rated maximum voltages of 362 kV and above.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
